---
title: "Implemented API methods"
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)

library(tRakt)
library(kableExtra)
library(purrr)
library(dplyr)

api <- yaml::read_yaml(here::here("api-methods.yml"))

api %>%
  map_dfr(~{
    map_dfr(.x, as_tibble, .id = "Method")
  }, .id = "Section") %>%
  mutate(
    endpoint = cell_spec(endpoint, link = url),
    Method = stringr::str_to_title(Method),
    Section = stringr::str_to_title(Section),
    implementation = cell_spec(implementation, monospace = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  select(-url) %>%
  kable(
    escape = FALSE,
    col.names = c("Section", "Method", "Endpoint", "Implementation")
  ) %>%
  kable_styling(position = "center") %>%
  collapse_rows(columns = 1)

```
